review_en: QUALITY_UNACCEPTABLE: I received someone's returned package with the box opened.
review_cn: 质量不可接受：我收到了别人退货的包裹，盒子是打开的。

tags.evidence: received someone's returned package with the box opened

review_cn: 订购错误：误订了2个，实际只需要1个。

review_en: The utensil holder doesnt stay on. Its very sturdy, but sits awkwardly on my sink....but maybe its just my sink. I wish it were just a tad deeper because big plates can easily get knocked over onto the floor if youre not careful.
review_cn: 餐具架无法固定。它非常坚固，但放在我的水槽上显得很别扭……也许只是我的水槽问题。我希望它能再深一点，因为如果不小心，大盘子很容易被打翻到地上。

tags.tag_name_cn: 使用中位置调节/固定不省心
tags.evidence: The utensil holder doesnt stay on.
sits awkwardly on my sink....but maybe its just my sink
big plates can easily get knocked over onto the floor if youre not careful

review_en: ORDERED_WRONG_ITEM: nice item but did not fit our sink
review_cn: 订购了错误的商品：东西不错，但不适合我们的水槽

review_en: DEFECTIVE: The product doesn't quite work for Science sinks, not quite the right size/fit
review_cn: 有缺陷：产品不太适合科学水槽，尺寸/适配性不太合适

review_en: DEFECTIVE: The product doesn't quite work for Science sinks, not quite the right size/fit
review_cn: 有缺陷：产品不太适合科学水槽，尺寸/适配性不太合适
